title: Treasurer of Sihala Urumaya (UK) Bodhipala Wijesinghe Felicitated
content: Dr. M. B. Ranatunga, President of SU (UK) presenting Mr Bodhipala Wijesinghe a certificate of honour. Also in the picture are Mrs. Ranatunga, Mr. R. Wimalasekera (Hon. Secretary), and Mr. Kandula Silva (Deputy Treasurer). Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sarath Dissanayaka) Mr Bodhipala Wijesinghe, the Honorary Treasurer of Sihala Urumaya (UK) was…
